item

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<Item,java.lang.Integer> stock
      This class provides the functionality for holding a list of items in stock and providing their quantity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Stock()
      Creates a Stock object which is of the type TreeMap

    • Field Detail

      • stock

        private java.util.Map<Item,java.lang.Integer> stock
        This class provides the functionality for holding a list of items in stock and providing their quantity. Note that this is different from Item as Item simply manages each item where Stock describes exactly what is in the Store Stock or what Stock may be on a Truck

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stock

        public Stock()
        Creates a Stock object which is of the type TreeMap
